divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband myself and my son were headed to eat and we were just leaving our home and had our SUV sunroof open. I looked up at the beautiful sky and immediately noticed a silver reflective object up high in the sky. I don't know how high it was but my husband and son both saw it. I tried to video it as he drove all the way to our restaurant (about 10 mins) but my camera phone angle was off so after later review saw a quick blurb in which I took a still shot (attached). Anyway, I observed it the entire drive until we reached our destination and I took my eyes off it to get out of the car and it was just gone.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Chaska
There were no other sightings in Chaska on or around August 17th 2013
Summary: Hovering silver reflective object seen in broad daylight.
